  program main
      implicit none
      character(len=200000) :: S
      integer :: n, i, j, tmp, radix, current
      integer :: mod_cnt(0:2018) 
      integer(kind=8) :: ans, term
      character(len=50) :: str_ans   ! 50 is enough for a 64-bit integer (max 20 digits)
      integer :: k

      ! Read the input string (one token)
      read(*, *) S
      n = len_trim(S)

      ! Initialize mod_cnt to 0
      mod_cnt = 0

      radix = 1
      current = 0

      do i = 1, n
          j = n - i + 1   ! the character index: from last to first
          ! Get the digit
          tmp = ichar(S(j:j)) - ichar('0')
          ! Compute: tmp = (digit * radix) mod 2019
          tmp = mod(tmp * radix, 2019)

          ! If not the first iteration, add the previous current value
          if (i > 1) then
              tmp = mod(tmp + current, 2019)
          end if

          current = tmp
          mod_cnt(current) = mod_cnt(current) + 1
          radix = mod(radix * 10, 2019)
      end do

      ! Account for the empty prefix
      mod_cnt(0) = mod_cnt(0) + 1

      ans = 0
      do i = 0, 2018
          if (mod_cnt(i) >= 2) then
              term = mod_cnt(i)
              term = term * (term - 1) / 2
              ans = ans + term
          end if
      end do

      ! Convert ans to a string
      write(str_ans, '(I0)') ans   ! I0: minimum width

      ! Replace every comma in str_ans by a space
      do k = 1, len(str_ans)
          if (str_ans(k:k) == ',') then
              str_ans(k:k) = ' '
          end if
      end do

      ! Output the string (trimmed to remove leading spaces? but I0 has no leading spaces) and a newline
      write(*, '(A)') trim(str_ans)

  end program
